review.comment: We love our new fencing!! We have brand new woven wire and 3 rail wooden fencing to accent the driveway with a new green gate.They are so nice to work with and hard working.when we need more fencing done we will definitely call Triple J Fencing!!

This company did an amazing job on my fence! They communicated well since it takes a while for them to put you on the schedule but well worth the job that is done. They did 3 board with no climb for my dogs and then my no climb custom runs in my kennel. I will use them again for future projects . They clean up when they are done , the job is done right. I was very impressed with the crew that came out.
Did good work and was happy to fix any issues.

If you are looking to have a fence installed and are having troubles finding someone to do it, look no further, Triple J is your place!  We called several people to do our fence and they all wanted to rake us over the coals and over charge.  These guys came out, were on time and gave me the best price for the entire Hopkinsville area.  We have had our fence for several months now and have had only two issues with it and those issues were corrected immediately.  I could not have asked for a better group of folks to come out and install my fence.  We will defiantly be using them again when we do the rest of the yard.

Service was very fast and friendly. Prices are reasonable and much cheaper then Lowe’s. All lumber was straight and of high quality. Very happy with my fence and service I received. Definitely recommend!

A very positive experience with Triple J Fencing! They were reliable, knowledgeable & responsive to my needs. Justin answered my request for information promptly & met the delivery schedule right on time. Awesome group of professionals to work with & my fence looks great! Thanks for all you did to make this experience easy.

I reached out to Triple J Fencing to have my 4 acres fenced in. They responded quickly and drove just under 2 hours to evaluate the job site. After informing Justin of my desires for the project, he assured me that his crew could get the job accomplished. He quickly provided a quote and a timeline for the completion of the project. On the day he provided to complete the job, his crew drove just under 2 hours with all the post, fencing, and necessary equipment to get the job done. The crew worked tirelessly to have the project completed and at a high level. They did an amazing job and I would recommend Triple J Fencing for your projects!

We needed a fence installed in our pasture. Justin provided quick estimate and discussed in detail what our fence would look like based on our needs. He told us a date of installation and met that timeline. It took less than 2 days to install and the team did a great job. The fence looks fantastic! We know it will keep our livestock contained for years to come. We would happily recommend Triple J Fencing in the future and look forward to calling on them for future projects!
They did my horse fence on my 2 acers done a great job thanks
Triple J did a great job! Fast, efficient work! They were there when they said they would be there and great work ethic! I will definitely use them again and recommend them as well!
Did a good job and there are professional people.
These guys did a great job. They know what they’re doing and wook well together. They are fast and the fence looks great!!!Very professional. I would highly recomend. Thanks guys😊👍
From the moment I called them, and they came out, gave me an estimate, and told me when they could do it. They stuck to their price and timetable. Very professional, did an excellent job.

These guys know what they are doing. I am the proud owner of the most beautiful , well made , strong fence. All my neighbors love the fence. This company is prompt and honest. You can't go wrong using these guys.

Justin and his crew did an amazing job installing the fence around our pool and patio.  They were easy to work with, communicated with us regularly leading up to the installation and after, and provided us with a truly beautiful finished product.  The fence’s lines are perfectly straight and the craftsmanship is undeniable.  We would recommend them to anyone without hesitation, and hope to work with them again.

Triple J has installed several pasture and borderline barb wire fences for us for our cattle.  They are dependable and trustworthy.  We could not be any happier with the service provided.  And most important the price quoted stays intact and they do the best job we have ever contracted.  Just them a call, you will not be disappointed.   Stan & Boni Wynn

I recently had the Triple J Fencing group fence a field for me.  They were very easy to work with and did an excellent job.  The fence looks good and they did a follow up with me to be sure I was satisfied.

This crew is the best group of young workers I’ve ever seen. If they tell you something you can count on it. We’ve used them on two different fences on our farm. This week we had them out to put up 5000 ft of 5-strand barbed wire and they did it in just 3 days. Watching these guys is like a colony of ants. Every man had a job and they are dang good at it. All in all it’s an amazing group of guys and I’d highly recommend them to anyone.
